summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Plat 58E, page 145 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property at approximately 4000 Martin Luther King Jr. Way South, from Lowrise Three Residential Commercial (L-3/RC) and Single Family 5000 (SF 5000) to Neighborhood Commercial Two/30-foot height limit (NC2/30') zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of King VN, Inc., C.F. 297695)
